parameters.name: CreationSource
parameters.description:
The source of the template. This parameter is required. Valid values:

*   System
*   UserDefined

parameters.name: DirectoryPath
parameters.description: The directory in which the template is stored. Slashes (/) are used to separate directory levels. The name of each directory level can be up to 1,024 characters in length. It cannot contain whitespace characters or slashes (/).

parameters.name: Name
parameters.description: The name of the template. If you want to query a system template, set this parameter to the name of the system template. Fuzzy match is supported.

parameters.name: PageNumber
parameters.description: The number of entries per page. Default value: 10.
